item.value: The param tag @{(*|**|f1[*])[,[-]f2[*]...]} is expected when parameter loginAO is an entity type.

private final UserAuthService userAuthService; private final TrainClassService trainClassService; private final UserCourseService userCourseService; @Override public IPage<OrderVO> getOrderByPage(Page<Order> page, Long userId, Long classId) { LambdaQueryWrapper<Order> queryWrapper = new LambdaQueryWrapper<>(); if (userId != null) { queryWrapper.eq(Order::getUserId, userId); } if (classId != null) { queryWrapper.eq(Order::getClassId, classId); } IPage<Order> orderPage = super.page(page, queryWrapper); if (CollectionUtils.isEmpty(orderPage.getRecords())) { return new Page<>(page.getCurrent(), page.getSize(), 0); } Set<Long> userIds = page.getRecords().stream().map(Order::getUserId).collect(Collectors.toSet()); Set<Long> classIds = page.getRecords().stream().map(Order::getClassId).collect(Collectors.toSet()); Map<Long, String> userAuthDict = userAuthService.findUserAuthDictByIds(userIds, UserAuth::getUsername); Map<Long, String> trainClassNameDict = trainClassService.findTrainClassDictByIds(classIds, TrainClass::getName); return orderPage.convert(order -> new OrderVO(order, userAuthDict.getOrDefault(order.getUserId(), String.valueOf(order.getUserId())), trainClassNameDict.getOrDefault(order.getClassId(), String.valueOf(order.getClassId())))); } @Override @Transactional public Long addOrder(OrderAO orderAO) { Order order = new Order(); BeanUtils.copyProperties(orderAO, order); order.setStatus(EnumsUtils.getEnumObject(OrderStatus.class, p -> p.ordinal() == orderAO.getStatus()).orElseThrow(() -> new BusinessException("订单状态值错误"))); order.setPaymentMethod(EnumsUtils.getEnumObject(PayType.class, p -> p.ordinal() == orderAO.getPaymentMethod()).orElseThrow(() -> new BusinessException("订单支付方式值错误"))); order.setOrderNumber(IdGenerator.nextIdStr()); if (order.getStatus() == OrderStatus.WAIT_FOR_PAY) { order.setPaymentTime(null); } super.save(order); userCourseService.addCourseFor(order.getUserId(), order.getClassId()); return order.getId(); }
worker Id can't be greater than 31 or less than 0
Note the order is from least to most specific (last one wins)
